targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("bytes")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.ipm.senderinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("bytes")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.ipm.receiverinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT 2*(sum("received_bytes") - sum("sent_bytes"))/(sum("sent_bytes")+sum("received_bytes")) FROM "dunedaq.networkmanager.connectioninfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' )  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

SELECT 2*(sum("received_bytes") - sum("sent_bytes"))/(sum("sent_bytes") + sum("received_bytes")) FROM "dunedaq.networkmanager.connectioninfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.[^.]+\.[^.]+/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

SELECT 2*(sum("received_bytes") - sum("sent_bytes"))/(sum("sent_bytes") + sum("received_bytes")) FROM "dunedaq.networkmanager.connectioninfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.[^.]+/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

SELECT 2*(sum("received_bytes") - sum("sent_bytes"))/(sum("sent_bytes")+sum("received_bytes")) FROM "dunedaq.networkmanager.connectioninfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${connection}/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)
SELECT sum("bytes") / sum("messages") FROM "dunedaq.ipm.senderinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND "messages">0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("messages")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.ipm.senderinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("messages")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.ipm.receiverinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT 2*(sum("received_messages") - sum("sent_messages"))/(sum("sent_messages")+sum("received_messages")) FROM "dunedaq.networkmanager.connectioninfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

SELECT 2*(sum("received_messages") - sum("sent_messages"))/(sum("sent_messages")+sum("received_messages")) FROM "dunedaq.networkmanager.connectioninfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.[^.]+\.[^.]+/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

SELECT 2*(sum("received_messages") - sum("sent_messages"))/(sum("sent_messages")+sum("received_messages")) FROM "dunedaq.networkmanager.connectioninfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${connection}/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(null)

SELECT sum("bytes") / sum("messages") FROM "dunedaq.ipm.receiverinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND "messages" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("bytes")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.ipm.senderinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~ /.*\.${application}\..*/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("bytes")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.ipm.receiverinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~ /.*\.${application}\..*/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("messages")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.ipm.senderinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~ /.*\.${application}\..*/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("messages")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.ipm.receiverinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~ /.*\.${application}\..*/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" WHERE $timeFilter
list.label: Partition name
list.name: partition
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" WHERE $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.ipm.senderinfo.Info","dunedaq.ipm.receiverinfo.Info" WITH KEY="source_id"  WHERE "partition_id"='$partition' AND $timeFilter
list.label: Application name
list.name: application
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.ipm.senderinfo.Info","dunedaq.ipm.receiverinfo.Info" WITH KEY="source_id"  WHERE "partition_id"='$partition' AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.ipm.senderinfo.Info","dunedaq.ipm.receiverinfo.Info" WITH KEY="source_id"  WHERE "partition_id"='$partition' AND $timeFilter
list.description: This selection removes the topics from the source ids, in this way we can setup alarms on the connections
list.label: Connection name
list.name: connection
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.ipm.senderinfo.Info","dunedaq.ipm.receiverinfo.Info" WITH KEY="source_id"  WHERE "partition_id"='$partition' AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.ipm.senderinfo.Info","dunedaq.ipm.receiverinfo.Info" WITH KEY="source_id"  WHERE "partition_id"='$partition' AND $timeFilter
list.description: This selection removes the topics from the source ids, in this way we can setup alarms on the connections
list.label: Topic
list.name: topic
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.ipm.senderinfo.Info","dunedaq.ipm.receiverinfo.Info" WITH KEY="source_id"  WHERE "partition_id"='$partition' AND $timeFilter
